latest_articles.title: The ‘strongest currency on earth’ just hit an 11-year high — and it’s stirring up trouble in Switzerland
latest_articles.summary: The Swiss franc is widely viewed as a safe haven asset, rising in value in times of geopolitical or macroeconomic uncertainty.

latest_articles.title: President Rinkēvičs departs for Davos
latest_articles.summary: Latvian President Edgars Rinkēvičs is out of the country for several days this week to participate in the annual large\-scale geopolitical talking shop that is the World Economic Forum (WEF) in Davos, Swit…
